analyzed: om
śrīmat prabhākara guru tantra dhurandhareṇa
mahā mahā upādhyāya śālikanāthamiśreṇa praṇītā prakaraṇa pañcikā
nyāyasiddhi ākhyayā vyākhyayā viṣama sthala ṭipparāyā
ca samalaṅkṛtā
atha viṣayakaraṇīyam nāma
dvādaśam prakaraṇam
prakaraṇa artha pratijñā
samyak ālocya kriyate mayā
viṣayam vivektum yukti varṇanā
jyotiṣṭomena svarga kāmaḥ yajeta iti evamādiṣu svarga kāma ādiḥ niyojya tvena sambadhyamānaḥ
na a svarga sādhane kārye boddhṛ tayā anvetum alam
kriyā hi kṣaṇabhaṅginī na kāla antara bhāvinaḥ svarga ādeḥ sādhanāya upapadyate iti

original: kālāntarāvasthāyi kriyāto bhinnaṃ kāryamapūrvaṃ liṅādayo bodhayantīti 1352sthitam /
analyzed: kāla antara avasthāyi kriyātaḥ bhinnam kāryam apūrvam liṅ ādayaḥ bodhayanti iti
sva siddhānta varṇanam
kāryam ca kṛti īpsitam ucyate
kṛtiḥ ātma vyāpāraḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ iti anarthāntaram
cetanaḥ ca ātmā kārye boddhṛ tayā anvayam upaiti
na ca anya vyāpāra abhinirvartyam anyaḥ sva sambandhi tayā kārya tvena saṃvedayitum alam iti
ātmanaḥ mānasa pratyakṣa samadhigamanīyaḥ prayatnaḥ sva vyāpāraḥ
atas tat nirvarttyam eva apūrvam kāryam ātmā manyate

original: prayatna eva bhavitavye 'pūrve prayojakabhūtasya bhāvayiturātmano vyāpāra iti,
analyzed: prayatne eva bhavitavye pūrve prayojaka bhūtasya bhāvayituḥ ātmanaḥ vyāpāraḥ iti
bhāvanā śabdena ucyate

original: na ca kāryābhidhānaṃ kṛtimanabhidadhatāṃ liṅādīnamupapadyata iti,
analyzed: na ca kārya abhidhānam kṛtim anabhidadhatām liṅ ādīn amupapadyate iti
te kṛtim api abhidadhati apūrvañca
na ca yugapad aneka abhidhānam doṣaḥ
tathā avagamāt
ānuguṇyāt ca
avagatā hi pramāṇena liṅ ādīnām kārya abhidhāyi tā
ānuguṇyāt
kṛtiḥ guṇa bhūtā pradhāna pada vartini apūrva ātmani kārye
avivādā ca kartṛ ādi gata saṅkhyā avacitā liṅ ādīnām kārya abhidhāyinām api
na ca abhidheya tā mātreṇa bhāvanāyāḥ eva vākya artha tvam
bhāvyam apūrvam prati guṇa bhāvena abhidhānāt
pradhāna bhāvena apūrvasya abhidhānāt tat eva vākya arthaḥ iti
na kiñcid anupapannam

original: ata eva bhagavato bhāṣyakārasya tatra tatra vyavahāraḥ---“puruṣaprayatnaḥ---karaṇamapūrvasya bhāvano“cyata1352 --iti /
analyzed: atas eva bhagavataḥ bhāṣyakārasya tatra tatra vyavahāraḥ puruṣa prayatnaḥ karaṇam apūrvasya iti
dhātvarthasya viṣaya tva upanyāsaḥ
tasya tathāvidhasya kāryasya nūnam kenacid bhāva arthena avacchedaḥ
na hi prayatnaḥ bhāva artham antareṇa asti
sarvaḥ hi puruṣa prayatnaḥ kañcid bhāva artham avaśyam āśrayate
tena vinā tat abhavāt
tena prayatna avinābhāvī bhāva arthaḥ prayatna abhinirvarttyam apūrvam avacchinatti
avacchedaka tayā eva
hi yaḥ bhavati na anyatra
sa tasya viṣaya eti viṣaya vidaḥ
bhāvaḥ viṣaya śabda arthaḥ iti ca
atas bhāvyaḥ eva arthaḥ viṣayaḥ
bhāvyasya eva puruṣa prayatna gocara tvāt

original: tena kāryābhidhāyibhissaha viṣayabodhakatayaiva bhāvārthaḥ karmaśabdassamabhivyāhāraṃ prathamamarhati,
analyzed: tena kārya abhidhāyibhiḥ saha viṣaya bodhaka tayā eva bhāva arthaḥ karma śabdaḥ samabhivyāhāram prathamam arhati
tasya
aviṣayam hi apūrvam kāryam pratyetum aśakyam

original: tena na jaghanyayā sādhanatayā bhāvārthānāmapūrveṇa sahānvayaḥ /

original: kintu pratītyupāyatāmeva manyamāno 1357bhagavānevaṃ brūte---“na hyaviṣayānniyogānniyogajñānamutpadyate” [bṛ. ṭī.] iti /
analyzed: kintu pratīti upāya tām eva manyamānaḥ iti

original: sa ca viṣayībhūtabhāvārthāvacchinno vidhyarthaḥ kāryātmā pratītaḥ karaṇam,
analyzed: sa ca viṣayībhūta bhāva artha avacchinnaḥ vidhi arthaḥ kārya ātmā pratītaḥ karaṇam

anyatra api sādhye tathā darśanāt

original: tatra sa eva bhāvārtho viṣayībhūtaḥ karaṇamityavasīyate,
analyzed: tatra saḥ eva bhāva arthaḥ viṣayībhūtaḥ karaṇam iti avasīyate
kṛti vyāpya tvāt
yaḥ hi yayā kṛtyā anya artha pravṛttayā viṣayīkrayate
saḥ eva tatra karaṇam
yathā paraśuḥ udyamana nipātanābhyām kāṣṭha gata dvaidhībhavana lakṣaṇa kārye pravṛttābhyām
vyāpyamānaḥ tayoḥ eva dvidhā bhavana lakṣaṇa phala avaccheda labdha dvaidhīkaraṇa vyapadeśyayoḥ chidi dhātu vācyayoḥ karaṇam
tathā iha api apūrva artha pravṛtta puruṣa prayatna vyāpyamānaḥ bhāvārthaḥ tasmin eva prayatne pūrva bhāvanā rūpe karaṇam

original: nanu kathaṃ prayatnalabdhātmā bhāvārtho bhāvanāyāṃ karaṇam /

ucyate

an īpsita tvāt

original: paraśusambandhaprabhāve hyudyamana-nipātane dvedhābhavanaphalaniṣpādakatayā dvedhābhāvane kāraṇatāṃ1360 bhajete /

atas udbhidā yajete tām brāhmaḥ
a pūrva bhāvanāyām karaṇa tvāt yāgasya
tad nāma tvāt ca udbhid śabdasya
evam ca apūrva phalayoḥ ekā eva bhāvanā
eka tvāt puruṣa prayatnasya
ekam eva ca karaṇam
tad bhāvanā vyāpya tvāt ekā eva bhāvya tā
eva ca sādhya vivṛddhiḥ iyam iti prābhākarāḥ
dhātvarthasya viṣaya tva karaṇa tvayoḥ upasaṃhāraḥ
viṣayībhūtasya karaṇa tā
hanta tarhi darśa pūrṇamāsābhyām iti atra tantra abhihitānām tantreṇa eva pratipatti anubandha tvāt
viṣaya bhāvasya eka tvāt ekam eva karaṇam syāt
tatas ca bhedena itikartavya tā sambandhaḥ na syāt
ucyatena samyak avadhṛtām āyuṣmatā śruti śālinām vacaḥ
yat eva viṣayībhūtam
tat eva karaṇam
na anyat iti tasya arthaḥ
prati iti anubandha tayā
ca viṣaya bhāvaḥ
sa yathā amidhānam avakalpate
pratipatti upāya tvāt abhidhānasya
atas tantra abhidhānāt sahitānām viṣaya bhāvaḥ
karaṇam tu siddhi anubandhī niyogasya
tat ca yathāsvabhāvam veditavyam

original: svabhāvādhīnāhi sādhanānāṃa sādhakateti svabhāvabhede bhinna sādhakatā /
analyzed: svabhāva adhīnā hi sādhanānām sādhaka tā iti svabhāva bhede sādhaka tā
sādhaka tve ca kṛti viṣaya tvāt karaṇa tā iti bhedena karaṇa bhāvaḥ

original: na hi kāryānabhidhāyipu laḍādiṣu bhāvanābhidhāne pramāṇamasti /

kim karāti
pacati iti uttara darśana pramāṇam upanyastam
tat api na sādhakam
vyāpāra viśeṣa praśnaḥ
tatra pacati iti uttareṇa tat eva nirdiśyate
yat tu vyāpāra mātra vāci dhātu uccāraṇa mātram na kriyate
tatra tāvat mātrasya apabhraṃśa tvāt
pratyaya antara uccāraṇe ca praśnena saha asambandhaḥ
atas eva acetana vyāpāre vartamāna apadeśa ādīnām prayogaḥ
liṅ ādayaḥ tu cetanam eva adhikṛtya prayujyante
na ca acetaneṣu gauṇaḥ prayogaḥ mukhya tve pi avirodhāt
kartṛ saṅkhyā ādi mātra vacanatve carathaḥ gacchati ityādiṣu mukhya tva āpatteḥ
na ca idam vācyam saṃyoga vibhāgau eva dhātvarthaḥ
vyāpāraḥ tu gacchati ityādiṣu laṭ arthaḥ
tena acetane mukhyaḥ eva laṭ arthaḥ iti
dhātūnām eva kriyā vāci tvāt prathama upanipātī vyāpāraḥ eva dhātvarthaḥ
na jadhanyau saṃyoga vibhāgau
kiñca aneka artha tā api āpadyeta
kevalasya saṃyogasya avācya tvāt
saṃyoga je saṃyoge gacchati iti aprayogāt
vibhāga je vibhāge prayoga anupalabdheḥ
na kevalasya saṃyogasya
vibhāgasya vā gami vācya tā iti
kim anena manīṣikā nimittena bāla jalpitena nirbandhena
śālika nāthena kṛtam kṛtinām upakāra siddhaye
